Texts.Chs: 我爱雪！当你试用这个武器的时候你也会喜欢雪的。在雪中玩得开心！
Texts.Eng: I love snow! You'll love snow too when you try out this weapon. Have fun in the snow!

Texts.Chs: 我喜欢雪。你不喜欢雪吗？下雪真是太好了。你想打雪仗吗？还有冰块？我有个武器给你。^green;如果你给我雪，^orange;超级多的雪^green;，我会给你这个武器^reset;.。快去给我拿点雪来！
Texts.Eng: I love snow. Don't you love snow? Snow is great. Do you want to shoot snow? And ice? I have a weapon for you. ^green;If you give me snow, ^orange;LOTS of snow^green;, I'll give you this weapon^reset;. Just bring me more snow!
